buttons.confirmText: 确定删除此单据吗，删除后数据不能恢复。

api.requestAdaptor:
const s = context.__super
const ss = s && s.__super

const token = ss && ss.token || ''
const appVersion = ss && ss.appVersion || 'v1.0.0'

const {
    page = 1,
    perPage: limit = 10,
    roleType = undefined,
    name = undefined,
    group = undefined,
    department = undefined,
    status = undefined,
    date_type = 1,
    start_date = undefined,
    end_date = undefined,
    date_sort = 1
} = context

return {
    ...api,
    data: JSON.stringify({
        flowId: 344,
        page,
        limit,
        roleType,
        name,
        group,
        department,
        status,
        date_type,
        start_date,
        end_date,
        date_sort,
        type: 605
    }),
    headers: {
        ...api.headers,
        "App-Version": appVersion,
        "Content-Type": "application/json;charset=UTF-8",
        Authorization: token
    }
}

api.requestAdaptor:
const s = context.__super
const ss = s && s.__super

const token = ss && ss.token || ''
const appVersion = ss && ss.appVersion || 'v1.0.0'

const {
    page = 1,
    perPage: limit = 10,
    roleType = undefined,
    name = undefined,
    group = undefined,
    department = undefined,
    date_type = 1,
    start_date = undefined,
    end_date = undefined,
    date_sort = 1
} = context

return {
    ...api,
    data: JSON.stringify({
        flowId: 344,
        page,
        limit,
        roleType,
        name,
        group,
        department,
        date_type,
        start_date,
        end_date,
        date_sort,
        billType: 2
    }),
    headers: {
        ...api.headers,
        "App-Version": appVersion,
        "Content-Type": "application/json;charset=UTF-8",
        Authorization: token
    }
}

actions.script:
/* 自定义JS使用说明：
  * 1.动作执行函数doAction，可以执行所有类型的动作
  * 2.通过上下文对象context可以获取当前组件实例，例如context.props可以获取该组件相关属性
  * 3.事件对象event，在doAction之后执行event.stopPropagation();可以阻止后续动作执行
*/
console.log("==================", context)
console.log("event ,,,,", event)
